product_name: Serfas Lycra Dual Density Saddle - Men's
long_description: Cyclists who seek out a tough ride shouldn't have to put up with a rough ride: this saddle absorbs the bumps. Dual Density base technology absorbs shock and allows the base to flex in critical areas. Soft open-cell padding is bonded to denser closed-cell foam to provide a firm foundation to support weight on longer rides. A top layer of Reactive Gel adds additional comfort. Deep groove design maximizes soft tissue protection and alleviates pelvic discomfort. This firm foundation efficiently supports the rider's weight to allow longer rides.
short_description: Cyclists who seek out a tough ride shouldn't have to put up with a rough ride: this saddle absorbs the bumps.
